si.title: හරිස් විරාමය
body_lines: හිටපු පාර්ලිමේන්තු මන්ත්රී එරිස් ශ්රී ලංකා මුස්ලිම් කොන්ග්රසයෙන් අත්හිටුවන ලදී

en.title: Haris pause
body_lines: Former MP Haris suspended from Sri Lanka Muslim Congress

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:

"Haris, former MP, suspended from Sri Lanka Muslim Congress. Key points: Haris was a member of parliament; He has been removed from his position in the party; The suspension likely stems from controversial actions or statements made by Haris while in office."
